mapper.select: SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, note, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment
SELECT sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, item_price itemPrice, note, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment_order (employee_orderer, branch_no, sports_equipment_no, quantity, total_price, employee_approver) VALUES (#{employeeOrderer},#{branchNo},#{sportsEquipmentNo},#{quantity}, (SELECT item_price * #{quantity} FROM sports_equipment WHERE sports_equipment.sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}), #{employeeApprover})
mapper.select: SELECT branch_no branchNo, branch_name branchName, branch_tel branchTel, branch_address branchAddress, createdate, updatedate, branch_level branchLevel, branch_active branchActive FROM branch WHERE branch_no = #{branchNo}

SELECT CEILING(COUNT(seo.order_no)/${rowPerPage}) AS lastPage FROM sports_equipment_order seo LEFT JOIN employee_detail oed ON seo.employee_orderer = oed.employee_no LEFT JOIN branch bch ON seo.branch_no = bch.branch_no LEFT JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no LEFT JOIN employee_detail aed ON seo.employee_approver = aed.employee_no
AND seo.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND seo.order_status = '대기'
ORDER BY seo.createdate DESC

SELECT seo.order_no orderNo, seo.employee_orderer employeeOrderer, oed.employee_name employeeOrdererName, seo.branch_no branchNo, bch.branch_name branchName, seo.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, se.item_name itemName, se.note AS note, se.item_name itemName, seo.quantity AS quantity, se.item_price itemPrice, (seo.quantity * se.item_price) totalPrice, seo.employee_approver employeeApprover, aed.employee_name employeeApproverName, seo.order_status orderStatus, seo.createdate FROM sports_equipment_order seo LEFT JOIN employee_detail oed ON seo.employee_orderer = oed.employee_no LEFT JOIN branch bch ON seo.branch_no = bch.branch_no LEFT JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no LEFT JOIN employee_detail aed ON seo.employee_approver = aed.employee_no where seo.order_no = #{orderNo}

SELECT sports_equipment_img_no sportsEquipmentImgNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, sports_equipment_img_origin_name sportsEquipmentImgOriginName, sports_equipment_img_file_name sportsEquipmentImgFileName, sports_equipment_img_size sportsEquipmentImgSize, sports_equipment_img_type sportsEquipmentImgType, createdate, updatedate FROM sports_equipment_img WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
